alert.note: Alert for Cass; Ransom (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 3:59PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Maple River near Enderlin affecting Ransom and Cass Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Pembina River at Neche affecting Pembina County. Sheyenne River near Kindred affecting Cass and Richland Counties. Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94) affecting Cass County. .Snowmelt river flooding to continue. Rate of rise and ultimate crest is uncertain due to rate of ongoing snowmelt runoff and possible rain and colder temperatures in the forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Maple River near Enderlin. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flooding of some farm buildings begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 7.8 feet. - Forecast...Ice jam could be in the area. Or melt that was being held up by ice has not found its way. Expected to rise to near moderate levels beyond the 7 day period. - Flood stage is 9.5 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
